Intervention.evidence: This study evaluates six potential treatments for hemorrhagic shock (HS): niacin, thiazolidinediones, prolyl hydroxylase domain inhibitors, O-GlcNAcylation stimulation, histone deacetylase inhibitors, and adenosine–lidocaine–magnesium solution.

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates six potential treatments for hemorrhagic shock (HS).

Result_Outcome.evidence: Niacin and thiazolidinediones showed improved survival in animal models, while prolyl hydroxylase domain inhibitors and O-GlcNAcylation stimulation demonstrated promising effects on cellular stress responses.
